sections.title: About Sharpen Image
content: Sharpen filter enhances edge definition and fine details in images, making them appear crisper and more defined. Essential for correcting soft or blurry photos.

sections.title: When to Sharpen
content: Photos that appear soft or blurry
Images for print that need extra clarity

sections.title: Sharpening Tips
content: Apply sharpening as the final step in editing
Use moderate amounts to avoid halos and artifacts
Sharpen at 100% zoom to see true effect
Different amounts for screen vs. print
Avoid sharpening noisy or low-quality images
